title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Teenagers piloting giant mechs must protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels while dealing with their own psychological struggles.

title: Crash Landing on You
description: A South Korean heiress crash-lands in North Korea while paragliding and comes into contact with a North Korean army officer, leading to a series of unexpected events and a cross-border romance.

title: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, seeks a worthy challenge to alleviate his boredom.

title: Itaewon Class
description: An ex-convict and his friends strive to make their bar in Itaewon a success while dealing with various challenges and personal growth.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where people have superpowers known as Quirks, Izuku Midoriya strives to become a hero despite being born without a Quirk.

title: Vincenzo
description: A lawyer with a Mafia background, Vincenzo Cassano, seeks justice in his own way while getting entangled in the complex world of South Korean corporate corruption.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a cat-and-mouse game with a genius detective.

title: Demon Slayer
description: After his family is slaughtered by demons and his sister turned into one, Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his sister.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunter Spike Spiegel and his eclectic crew travel the galaxy in pursuit of the galaxy's most dangerous criminals.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter to find his missing father and discover the world's secrets.

title: Attack on Titan
description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures, the story follows Eren Yeager and his friends who join the military to fight the Titans.

title: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
description: A self-absorbed vice chairman and his capable secretary navigate their changing relationship as she decides to resign after working for him for nine years.

title: Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo
description: A modern-day woman is transported back in time to the Goryeo era and becomes entangled with the princes vying for the throne.

title: Goblin
description: A goblin and his bride's fateful romance unfolds as they navigate the challenges set by the deities in their quest for redemption and love.

title: Descendants of the Sun
description: A love story between a soldier and a surgeon unfolds in a fictional war-torn country, exploring the challenges of duty and love.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A self-proclaimed mad scientist discovers a way to send messages to the past, leading to unforeseen consequences and a thrilling adventure.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
description: In an alternate future, Lelouch vi Britannia gains the power of Geass and leads a rebellion against the oppressive Britannian Empire.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, an aspiring ninja, seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

title: Haikyuu!!
description: Inspired by a small-statured player, a high school student joins the volleyball team and aims to become the best player in the sport.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: After a chance encounter with a flesh-eating ghoul, a college student undergoes a horrifying transformation and must navigate the dark and dangerous world of ghouls.

title: Mr. Sunshine
description: A Korean-born American soldier returns to his homeland as a U.S. Marine officer and gets involved in the struggles and conflicts of the late Joseon era.

title: Hospital Playlist
description: Five doctors and long-time friends navigate the challenges of life and medicine as they work in the same hospital.

title: Reply 1988
description: Set in the late 1980s, the drama follows the lives and relationships of five childhood friends living in the same neighborhood.

title: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
description: A psychiatric hospital caregiver and a popular children's book author with an antisocial personality disorder develop an unconventional romance.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: In a world of alchemy, two brothers seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

title: Kingdom
description: A prince investigates a mysterious plague that turns people into flesh-eating monsters, uncovering political conspiracies along the way.

title: Your Lie in April
description: A talented pianist, traumatized by his mother's death, finds inspiration and love through a free-spirited violinist.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players get trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG, where death in the game means death in real life, and must navigate the challenges to survive.

title: While You Were Sleeping
description: Three individuals with the ability to foresee future events become entangled in a web of fate, solving crimes and preventing tragedies.

title: One Piece
description: Follow Monkey D. Luffy and his diverse crew of pirates as they search for the ultimate treasure, the One Piece, in this epic adventure.

title: Start-Up
description: Aspiring entrepreneurs navigate the competitive world of startups, love, and friendship, pursuing their dreams in the tech industry.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Goku and his friends defend Earth against powerful foes and seek the magical Dragon Balls in this iconic anime series.

title: The King: Eternal Monarch
description: A modern-day Korean emperor crosses into an alternate universe and becomes entangled in a political conspiracy and a love story.

title: Hotel Del Luna
description: The owner of a supernatural hotel that caters to ghosts and spirits encounters a human guest who becomes her business partner, unraveling their intertwined fates.
